<!-- Tiny filter script -->
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function () {
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('#filters [data-filter]');
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll('#projects-grid .project');

  buttons.forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener('click', () => {
      buttons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove('active'));
      btn.classList.add('active');
      const key = btn.dataset.filter.toLowerCase();

      cards.forEach(card => {
        const tags = (card.dataset.tags || '').toLowerCase();
        const show = key === 'all' || tags.includes(key);
        // hide/show the column that contains the card
        card.closest('.col-12, .col-sm-6, .col-lg-4').style.display = show ? '' : 'none';
      });
    });
  });
});
</script>
